verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician,<s%> A Psalm of <S%H1732>David,<s%> to bring to <S%H2142>remembrance.<s%> Make haste, O <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> me; make <S%H2363>haste<s%> to <S%H5833>help<s%> me, O <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Let them be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> and <S%H2659>confounded<s%> that seek <S%H1245>after<s%> my <S%H5315>soul:<s%> let them be <S%H5472>turned<s%> <S%H268>backward,<s%> and put to <S%H3637>confusion,<s%> that <S%H2655>desire<s%> my <S%H7451>hurt.<s%>
Let them be turned <S%H7725>back<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> a <S%H6118>reward<s%> of their <S%H1322>shame<s%> that <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H1889>Aha,<s%> <S%H1889>aha.<s%>

Let <S%H3605>all<s%> those that <S%H1245>seek<s%> thee <S%H7797>rejoice<s%> and be <S%H8055>glad<s%> in thee: and let such as <S%H157>love<s%> thy <S%H3444>salvation<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H8548>continually,<s%> Let <S%H430>God<s%> be <S%H1431>magnified.<s%>

But <S%H589>I<s%> am <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy:<s%> make <S%H2363>haste<s%> unto me, O <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art my <S%H5828>help<s%> and my <S%H6403>deliverer;<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> make <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H309>tarrying.<s%>
